sentence.Network_en: This is a good fabric softener for woolens.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一种很好的羊毛织物柔软剂.

sentence.Network_en: Ion exchange softening Series: If Mobile - bed tower, Combined softener and Automatic softener.
sentence.Network_cn: 离子交换软化系列: 如三塔流动床 、 组合式软水器和全自动软水器.

sentence.Network_en: Some advises about the formulations of the textile softener were also presented.
sentence.Network_cn: 并针对市场情况提出了在民用柔顺剂配方方面的合理化建议.

entry.tran: 硬水软化器，硬水软化剂(可以去除水中某些矿物质，使洗衣时容易产生肥皂泡)
entry.def: A water softener is a device or substance which removes certain minerals, for example calcium, from water, so that it makes bubbles easily when you use soap to wash things.

entry.tran: 织物软化剂，柔顺剂(洗衣时加入水中的一种化学物质，可使衣物手感柔和)
entry.def: A fabric softener is a chemical substance that you add to water when you wash clothes in order to make the clothes feel softer.

means.word_mean: 1. a substance added to another to make it less softer
